metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1115-1 -- Recommended update for ksh
metadata.description:
This update for Korn Shell provides fixes for the following issues:
* #808449: set -k does not work properly with ksh-93t-13.17 and higher * #814135: crash in bestreclaim() after traversing a memory block with a very large size * #824187: set -k breaks aliases with ksh-93u.
